caption:
This Nurses Week, @TheNursingBeat have partnered with @CeraVe to gift you some top-notch products. As a therapeutic skincare brand rooted in the medical community, CeraVe is committed to acknowledging and celebrating nurses. #CeraVePartner 

CeraVe has entered a multi-year partnership with @thedaisyfoundation to join them in their mission to increase recognition of the critical role nurses play in the medical community and the lifelong impact that nurses have on their patients.

This year, in appreciation for all that you do, CeraVe has partnered with The Nursing Beat to gift 40 lucky nurses a skin care bundle valued at more than $100! 

🧖‍♀️ Let’s keep those hands moisturized and your skin glowing. 

⭐️ To enter, simply visit the link in bio and enter your email. We’ll randomly select winners the week of 5/12. 

👉 Spread the love—share this post and tag a deserving nurse!

Giveaway is not associated with Meta. Giveaway closes 5/12 2359 EST. Winners will be contacted after the giveaway period closes via email. Winners must be located in the United States and must be 18 years or older at the time of entry. By entering, you agree to The Nursing Beat’s Giveaway Terms & Conditions.

#CeraVepartner #sponsored
